Summary: Two bright lights shining down from above.
divs: sighting detailsthe two witnesses were driving together, travelling eastbound on state route 12. at butler mill road, near porter, they noticed two bright lights shining down from the sky. they stopped the car to look, but were afraid to get out of their car. they said that other cars drove by, honking at them. both witnesses said the two lights appeared to be connected, shining from a single location\craft. no craft was seen and nothing was heard. both witnesses called 911 from their cell phones. after making the report to the 911 center, they drove off. they noticed that both of their cell phones suddenly lost any signal.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Malone-Porter
This sighting has never been favorited.
